channel.title: Talking npcs and owner notification
channel.description:
how do i change what the npcs say. its saying thug life is offline, i want it to say Owner Blain is online
also how do i make the writing at the top change from Owner = fr33sc4p3 to Owner = Owner Blain
and i know aout how to make myself admin, i just cant remember which file its on

item.title: Talking npcs and owner notification
item.dc:creator: @Blain Blain
item.description:
@Blain wrote:

thanks sir you have been a big help

Read full topic

item.title: Talking npcs and owner notification
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

how do i change what the npcs say. its saying thug life is offline, i want it to say Owner Blain is online

Open your NPCHandler.java and search for:

thug life

It should look something like, not exactly like:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2168) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Bla bla bla"; } }

Where it says npcs[i].textUpdate = “…”; change the thug life to whatever you want that NPC to say.

also how do i make the writing at the top change from Owner = fr33sc4p3 to
Owner = Owner Blain

Open your client.java and search for:

fr33sc4p3

Then replace that with Owner Blain.

and i know aout how to make myself admin, i just cant remember which file its on

In your folder where you see your client.java etc, there’s a folder called Characters. Your name should be in there.

Read full topic
